decks.notes: The deck revolves around utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and efficient control spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while advancing its own. Aragorn, King of Gondor serves as the commander, providing a powerful and versatile option for the deck. The main deck includes a mix of countermagic, removal, and card draw to maintain tempo and pressure on the opponent. By efficiently managing resources and applying pressure through threats like True-Name Nemesis and Murktide Regent, the deck aims to close out the game quickly while keeping the opponent on the back foot. Additionally, the inclusion of disruptive cards like Hullbreacher and Teferi, Time Raveler further enhances the deck's ability to control the board and disrupt opponents' strategies.

This deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption, removal spells, and powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The goal is to keep the opponent on the back foot with constant threats and resource denial, while accelerating your own mana production with cards like Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth. By efficiently removing threats and forcing the opponent to discard key cards, this deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and close out the game quickly. Additionally, cards like Necrodominance and Emrakul, the Promised End provide powerful late-game plays to secure victory.

This deck focuses on leveraging Norin, Swift Survivalist's ability to repeatedly enter and leave the battlefield to trigger aggressive cards and deal consistent damage to the opponent. It includes a variety of low-cost, efficient creatures and burn spells to apply pressure early and maintain momentum throughout the game. Additionally, the deck features cards that provide additional value when Norin triggers, such as Robber of the Rich and Feldon, Ronom Excavator. By constantly utilizing Norin's unique ability in combination with a proactive game plan, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, consistent damage and disrupt their strategy to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive play using two partner commanders, Bruse Tarl, Boorish Herder and Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful. The strategy revolves around quickly deploying creatures and using combat tricks and removal spells to push through damage. The deck includes a mix of creatures with powerful abilities like Arbaaz Mir and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar, along with efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt. The mana base is optimized for fast and consistent mana production, allowing the deck to efficiently cast its spells. Overall, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through counterspells and disruption while setting up for powerful spells that can either generate card advantage or combo off for a win. Lier, Disciple of the Drowned's ability to recast spells from the graveyard synergizes well with cards like High Tide, Brainstorm, and Frantic Search, allowing the deck to generate a lot of mana and draw cards to find its win conditions. The deck also utilizes bounce spells like Into the Flood Maw and Unsubstantiate to deal with threats, as well as disruptive spells like Pact of Negation and Force of Will to protect its own game plan. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver its opponent to secure a victory.
